thread.title: Consumers think IoT security is a piece of cake; IT pros have another name for it
thread.title_full: Consumers think IoT security is a piece of cake; IT pros have another name for it

title: Consumers think IoT security is a piece of cake; IT pros have another name for it
text:
14 Consumers think IoT security is a piece of cake; IT pros have another name for it 
CIO: So you think you can control the security of the connected devices in your house? Ask the IT security professionals: They don't think so.That was one thing the IT security organization ISACA learned when it surveyed U.S. consumers and professionals about the Internet of Things. Judging by how wary security experts are about IoT, consumers' confidence may be misplaced.
